description: This file defines an interface class 'UdevImpl' with virtual methods for udev device management, and a 'Udev' class providing static methods to interact with udev-related functions. It also declares external function pointers corresponding to these functions. The file serves as a mock or interface layer for udev device enumeration and management in a C++ project.

classes.name: UdevImpl
classes.description: Abstract class defining virtual methods for udev device management, intended for implementation by subclasses.

classes.name: Udev
classes.description: Wrapper class providing static methods to interact with udev device management functions, associated with a pluggable implementation.

methods.name: setImpl
methods.description: Sets the static implementation instance for Udev.

methods.name: udev_enumerate_new
methods.description: Creates a new udev enumeration object.

methods.name: udev_enumerate_add_match_subsystem
methods.description: Adds a match filter for subsystem to the enumeration.

methods.name: udev_enumerate_scan_devices
methods.description: Scans devices based on the enumeration's filters.

methods.name: udev_enumerate_get_list_entry
methods.description: Retrieves the list of devices found during enumeration.

methods.name: udev_enumerate_unref
methods.description: Unreferences and frees the enumeration object.

methods.name: udev_list_entry_get_name
methods.description: Gets the name of a list entry.

methods.name: udev_device_new_from_syspath
methods.description: Creates a udev device object from a sys path.

methods.name: udev_device_get_parent_with_subsystem_devtype
methods.description: Retrieves parent device with specific subsystem and devtype.

methods.name: udev_device_get_devtype
methods.description: Gets the device type of a udev device.

methods.name: udev_device_get_devnode
methods.description: Gets the device node for a udev device.
